name: Path of Gloria
description:
A game made in 48 hours, submission to the Mix&Game jam! Theme was mixing genres and Path of Gloria mixes ... well, i guess its a endless-physics-based-beat-em-up? 

Something like that!

HOW TO PLAY

- The sword follows the mouse's position!

- WASD to move.

Notice:

It might be a buggy mess at the moment and due to the time restriction, audio was not implemented :/

Still appreciate feedback though, i plan to update this game to playable state!
